item.description:
This event is being organized by Pamela.

Haven't had a good home cooked meal in awhile! I'm thinking about having Sunday dinner after the JFK event on November 22nd. My house is around the corner from UMasss and has a roofdeck that over looks Dorchester Bay, UMass, and the JFK library. I will cook baked whole chicken, homemade mac-n-cheese, string beans and cornbread. Please bring a side dish, dessert, or beverage to share. Email me if you have any questions about what to bring. I will send my contact information to those who RSVP yes.

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Sunday dinner at Pamela's!
